title: Tier List
body:
God Tier [Highest Influence]:
Mid-Lane Gods: Ahri, Zed
Jungle Gods: Shyvana, Udyr, Master Yi, Xin Zhao
Marksman Gods: Sivir, Graves, Jhin, Twitch
Top Lane Gods: Nautilus, Malphite, Graves, Poppy, Quinn, Sion, Pantheon
Support Gods: Janna, Blitzcrank, Soraka

Tier 1 [Strong/Preferred Choices]:
Mid-Lane: Malzahar, Anivia, Twisted Fate, Morgana, Kayle, Fizz, Lux, Corki, Annie, Vel'Koz, Diana, Zyra, Brand,  Talon, Karma, Yasuo, Zilean
Jungle: Amumu, Volibear, Gragas, Sejuani, Graves, Vi, Ekko, Skarner, Nidalee, Warwick, Quinn, Zac, Rammus, Kindred, Shaco, Jax, Nocturne, Trundle
Marksman: Kog'Maw, Corki, Lucian, Ashe, Ezreal, Quinn, Jinx, Kalista, Miss Fortune
Top Lane: Kayle, Wukong, Trundle, Rammus, Shen, Nasus, Darius, Dr. Mundo, Garen, Jarvan IV, Swain, Volibear, Zac, Tryndamere
Support: Sona, Nami, Nautilus, Taric, Leona, Trundle, Brand, Braum, Alistar


Tier 2 [Viable/Balanced Choices]:
Mid-Lane: Cho'Gath, Quinn, Lulu, Wukong, Galio, Katarina, Azir, Gangplank, Karthus, Ziggs, Vladimir, Xerath, Heimerdinger, Lissandra, Viktor, Kennen, Leblanc, Aurelion Sol, Kassadin, Swain, Jayce, Pantheon, Syndra, Orianna, Cassiopeia
Jungle: Elise, Poppy, Wukong, Kha'Zix, Fiddlesticks, Diana, Dr. Mundo, Rumble, Nunu, Hecarim, Rek'Sai, Lee Sin, Maokai, Kayle, Malphite, Sion, Fizz, Aatrox, Nautilus, Irelia, Jarvan IV, Tahm Kench, Tryndamere, Pantheon, Evelynn, Rengar, Cho'Gath
Marksman: Vayne, Tristana, Draven, Caitlyn, Kindred, Varus, Urgot
Top Lane: Renekton, Cho'gath, Gangplank, Irelia, Fiora, Akali, Yasuo, Teemo, Riven, Kennen, Gnar, Singed, Illaoi, Lissandra, Ryze, Jax, Vladimir, Ekko, Tahm Kench, Diana, Hecarim, Aatrox, Olaf, Lulu, Rek'Sai, Xin Zhao, Morgana, Maokai, Heimerdinger, Karma, Malzahar, Jayce, Rengar, Nidalee, Galio, Fizz, Aurelion Sol, Warwick, Udyr, Urgot, Lee Sin, Viktor, Vi
Support: Thresh, Poppy, Vel'Koz, Zilean, Lulu, Morgana, Zyra, Lux, Shen, Bard, Annie, Sion, Karma


Tier 3 [Needs Higher Skill/Knowledge Than Usual]:
Mid-Lane: Ezreal (AP), Veigar, Ekko, Nidalee, Akali, Kog'Maw (AP), Varus, Teemo, Ryze, Master Yi, Gragas, Jarvan IV, Ezreal (AD), Urgot, Sona, Jhin, Mordekaiser, Tahm Kench, Riven, Fiddlesticks, Kha'Zix, Malphite, Evelynn, Leona, Elise, Tristana (AP)
Jungle: Olaf, Aurelion Sol, Nasus, Gangplank, Fiora, Zed, Malzahar, Karthus, Leona, Riven, Darius, Shen, Yorick, Garen, Alistar
Marksman: Kennen, Mordekaiser, Twisted Fate, Thresh
Top Lane: Rumble, Zed, Cassiopeia, Gragas, Yorick, Mordekaiser, Master Yi, Kha'Zix, Talon, Karthus, Shyvana, Kassadin, Azir, Alistar, Leblanc, Vayne, Nunu, Elise, Braum, Taric
Support: Tahm Kench, Volibear, Malphite, Shaco, Veigar, Xerath, Gragas, Maokai, Kayle, Kennen, Fiddlesticks, Nunu, Nidalee, Pantheon, Ashe, Anivia, Elise, Teemo, Lee Sin, Gangplank


Tier 4 [Low Benefits for Effort Used]:
Mid-Lane: Soraka, Janna
Jungle:
Marksman:
Top Lane: Soraka
Support: Orianna, Galio, Syndra, Yorick, Lissandra, Leblanc

thought some people might want to see

replies.body: Kayle should be in the god tier top laners.
Rofl Soraka is not "god tier" she is pretty garbage now. Those last nerfs brought her way down. And Taric in Tier 1? LOL I hope you're referring to reworked Taric.
Where did the stats come from? I also didn't see Diana Jg and J4. Isn't reliable in any form. He s so weak he garbage.

J4 is strong as fuck right now with the itemization and ult buff.

Diana jungle is retardedly overpowered.

Also, http://www.nerfplz.com is the site. Diamond player makes the tierlists there. Pretty accurate to a point.
fucking brick wall of text, you thought some one wanted to see this shit?
this is not really much text. Just champions names
I lol everytime I see Xin bans or people refer to him as a god tier jungler
